info.title: Visual Studio Projects Resource Provider Client
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Visual Studio Team Services resources through the Azure Resource Manager. All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request. You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/index.

get.description: Gets all Visual Studio Team Services project resources created in the specified Team Services account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: rootResourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services account.

200.description: The operation succeeded. The response contains the details of the Visual Studio Team Services project resources created in the specified Team Services account.

get.description: Gets the details of a Team Services project resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: rootResourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services account.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services project.

200.description: The operation succeeded. The response contains the details of the updated team project resource.

404.description: The project or Azure subscription was not found.

put.description: Creates or updates a Team Services project in the collection with the specified name. 'VersionControlOption' and 'ProcessTemplateId' must be specified in the resource properties. Valid values for VersionControlOption: Git, Tfvc. Valid values for ProcessTemplateId: 6B724908-EF14-45CF-84F8-768B5384DA45, ADCC42AB-9882-485E-A3ED-7678F01F66BC, 27450541-8E31-4150-9947-DC59F998FC01 (these IDs correspond to Scrum, Agile, and CMMI process templates).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: rootResourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services account.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services project.

parameters.name: validating
parameters.description: This parameter is ignored and should be set to an empty string.

200.description: The operation succeeded. The response contains the details of the created or updated team project resource.

202.description: The operation succeeded. A job to create/update the team project resource has been queued. The URI to monitor the status of the job is provided in the 'location' header.

patch.description: Updates the tags of the specified Team Services project.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: rootResourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services account.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Team Services project.

200.description: The operation succeeded. The response contains the details of the updated team project resource.

ApplicationSource.description: Defines the source application for a VSTS pipeline.

ApplicationTarget.description: Defines the target resources for a VSTS pipeline.

parameters.description: Authorization parameters corresponding to the authorization type.

Authorization.description: Defines the authorization type and its parameters.

defaultBranch.description: Default branch for which continuous integration should be configured in the VSTS pipeline.

id.description: Unique identifier of the code repository.

CodeRepositoryApplicationSource.description: Defines the source application, when it resides in a code repository.

authorizationReference.description: Reference to the authorization info used to access the code repository. This value is used as a key into the global authorization details dictionary.

defaultBranch.description: Default branch for which continuous integration should be configured in the VSTS pipeline.

id.description: Unique identifier of the code repository.

templateId.description: Identifier of the pipeline template used for configuring pipeline.

templateParameters.description: Dictionary of inputs used for configuring pipeline. The keys for inputs are defined by pipeline template.

PipelineBootstrapConfiguration.description: Defines bootstrap configuration for a CI/CD pipeline.

authorizationDetails.description: Global dictionary of authorization details used by the pipeline, with a friendly name as key. Individual resource in the pipeline can reference to a specific authorization info using the friendly name.

kind.description: Kind of project resource. A bootStrappedProject is a project which has additional bootstrap information to create a CI/CD pipeline in the project.

ProjectResource.description: A Visual Studio Team Services project resource.

ProjectResourceListResult.description: The response to a request to list Team Services project resources in a resource group/account.

ownerUpn.description: Optional UPN of the owner, on-behalf-of whom the project is being created.

pipelineBootstrapConfigurations.description: Bootstrap configuration for pipelines in Team Project.

processTemplateId.description: Process template to use in the project.

tfsUniqueIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of the VSTS project.

versionControlOption.description: Version control to use for the default repo created in the project.

ProjectResourceProperties.description: Defines the custom properties of project resource.

pipelineBootstrapConfigurations.description: Bootstrap configurations for pipelines in Team Project.

tags.description: The custom tags to be set on the resource.

ProjectResourceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters to update a project resource.

Resource.description: A generic Azure Resource Manager resource.

authorizationReference.description: Reference to the authorization info used to access the target resource. This value is used as a key into the global authorization details dictionary.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target resource.

TargetResource.description: Defines a single resource used as target for a VSTS pipeline.

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.
